Steps:

  We'll have:
    module qsort_mod
    contains
      recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer :: p
        if (lo < hi) then

children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
call quicksort(arr, p+1, hi)
        end if
      end subroutine

      subroutine random_partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer, intent(out) :: p
        real :: r
        integer :: random_index, temp
        call random_number(r) random_index = lo + floor(r*(hi-lo+1))
        ! swap arr(random_index) and arr(hi)
        temp = arr(hi)
        arr(hi) = arr(random_index)
        arr(random_index) = temp
        call partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
      end subroutine

      subroutine partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer, intent(out) :: p
        integer :: pivot, i, j, temp
        pivot = arr(hi)
        i = lo - 1
        do j = lo, hi-1
            if (arr(j) <= pivot) then i = i + 1
                ! swap arr(i) and arr(j)
                temp = arr(i)
                arr(i) = arr(j)
                arr(j) = temp
            end if
        end do
        ! swap arr(i+1) and arr(hi)
        temp = arr(i+1)
        arr(i+1) = arr(hi)
        arr(hi) = temp
        p = i+1
      end subroutine

  subroutine init_random_seed()
    integer :: i, n, clock
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: seed

    call random_seed(size = n)
    allocate(seed(n))
    call system_clock(count=clock)
    seed = clock + 37 * (/ (i - 1, i = 1, n) /) call random_seed(put = seed)
    deallocate(seed)

But note: the condition for the inner loops: we want to stop at an element >= pivot (for the left) and <= pivot (for the right). This is the Hoare partition. This version is simpler and doesn't require random numbers. So we'll use that. Now, the entire program:

  program combined
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, c
    integer, allocatable :: arr(:)

    read(*,*) n
    allocate(arr(n))
    do i = 1, n
        read(*,*) arr(i)
    end do

    call quicksort(arr, 1, n) c = 1
    do i = 1, n
        if (arr(i) >= c) c = c + 1
    end do

    write(*,*) c

  contains

  recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    if (lo >= hi) return   ! base case
    i = lo
    j = hi
    pivot = arr((lo+hi)/2)
    do while (i <= j)
        do while (i <= hi .and. arr(i) < pivot)
            i = i+1
        end do
        do while (j >= lo .and. arr(j) > pivot)
            j = j-1
        end do
        if (i <= j) then
            temp = arr(i)
            arr(i) = arr(j)
            arr(j) = temp
            i = i+1
            j = j-1
        end if
    end do
    if (lo < j) call quicksort(arr, lo, j)

  recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp i = lo
    j = hi
    pivot = arr((lo+hi)/2)

            j = j-1

  for each element in the sorted array (from smallest to largest):

We'll structure:

  program combined
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, c
    integer, allocatable :: arr(:)
    real :: rand_temp  ! for random seed initialization, but we don't use it for the sort? Actually we use random in sort.

    c = 1 do i = 1, n
        if (arr(i) >= c) then
            c = c + 1
        end if
    end do

    ! Print c
    write(*,*) c

  contains

tree.original_reasoning:
We are given two Java programs to be executed in sequence.

First program (codeforces_682_B):
  - Reads an integer `n`.
  - Reads `n` integers and stores them in a list.
  - Sorts the list.
  - Then it iterates over the list and maintains a counter `c` starting at 1.
    For each element, if the element is >= `c`, then it increments `c`.

  We'll have:
    module qsort_mod
    contains
      recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer :: p
        if (lo < hi) then
            call random_partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
            call quicksort(arr, lo, p-1)
            call quicksort(arr, p+1, hi)
        end if
      end subroutine

      subroutine random_partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer, intent(out) :: p
        real :: r
        integer :: random_index, temp
        call random_number(r)
        random_index = lo + floor(r*(hi-lo+1))
        ! swap arr(random_index) and arr(hi)
        temp = arr(hi)
        arr(hi) = arr(random_index)
        arr(random_index) = temp
        call partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
      end subroutine

      subroutine partition(arr, lo, hi, p)
        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
        integer, intent(out) :: p
        integer :: pivot, i, j, temp
        pivot = arr(hi)
        i = lo - 1
        do j = lo, hi-1
            if (arr(j) <= pivot) then
                i = i + 1
                ! swap arr(i) and arr(j)
                temp = arr(i)
                arr(i) = arr(j)
                arr(j) = temp
            end if
        end do
        ! swap arr(i+1) and arr(hi)
        temp = arr(i+1)
        arr(i+1) = arr(hi)
        arr(hi) = temp
        p = i+1
      end subroutine

  call init_random_seed()

  subroutine init_random_seed()
    integer :: i, n, clock
    integer, dimension(:), allocatable :: seed

    call random_seed(size = n)
    allocate(seed(n))
    call system_clock(count=clock)
    seed = clock + 37 * (/ (i - 1, i = 1, n) /)
    call random_seed(put = seed)
    deallocate(seed)
  end subroutine

  recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    i = lo
    j = hi
    pivot = arr((lo+hi)/2)
    do while (i <= j)
        do while (arr(i) < pivot)
            i = i+1
        end do
        do while (arr(j) > pivot)
            j = j-1
        end do
        if (i <= j) then
            temp = arr(i)
            arr(i) = arr(j)
            arr(j) = temp
            i = i+1
            j = j-1
        end if
    end do
    if (lo < j) call quicksort(arr, lo, j)
    if (i < hi) call quicksort(arr, i, hi)
  end subroutine

Now, the entire program:

  program combined
    implicit none
    integer :: n, i, c
    integer, allocatable :: arr(:)

    read(*,*) n
    allocate(arr(n))
    do i = 1, n
        read(*,*) arr(i)
    end do

    call quicksort(arr, 1, n)

    c = 1
    do i = 1, n
        if (arr(i) >= c) c = c + 1
    end do

    write(*,*) c

  contains

  recursive subroutine quicksort(arr, lo, hi)
    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: lo, hi
    integer :: i, j, pivot, temp
    if (lo >= hi) return   ! base case
    i = lo
    j = hi
    pivot = arr((lo+hi)/2)
    do while (i <= j)
        do while (i <= hi .and. arr(i) < pivot)
            i = i+1
        end do
        do while (j >= lo .and. arr(j) > pivot)
            j = j-1
        end do
        if (i <= j) then
            temp = arr(i)
            arr(i) = arr(j)
            arr(j) = temp
            i = i+1
            j = j-1
        end if
    end do
    if (lo < j) call quicksort(arr, lo, j)
    if (i < hi) call quicksort(arr, i, hi)
  end subroutine quicksort

  end program
